src:
侍ジャパン３連勝！誠也が豪快弾含む３安打４打点の大暴れ　菊池の美技連発に敵地沈黙

07 Nov 2019

　「プレミア１２・１次ラウンド、日本８－１台湾」（７日、台中インターコンチネンタル野球場）
　侍ジャパンが主砲鈴木（広島）の活躍で台湾を圧倒。１次ラウンドを無傷の３連勝で飾り、スーパーラウンドに弾みをつけた。
　完全アウェーの一戦で、侍の主砲が大暴れだ。一回、２死一塁で４番・鈴木が左中間へ先制の適時三塁打。チームに勢いを呼び込むと、続く吉田（オリックス）も右前適時打を放った。
　三回は鈴木の驚弾に敵地が静まりかえった。２死一塁で豪快に振り抜いた打球は逆風を切り裂き、左中間席中段に届く２戦連発の２ラン。滞空時間の長い一撃で、圧巻のパワーを見せつけた。六回には丸（巨人）の今大会初安打となる適時二塁打でリードを広げた。
　前夜、プエルトリコを完封した投手陣は粘り強くつないだ。先発の今永（ＤｅＮＡ）が３回４安打無失点でしのぐと、大野（中日）も２回４安打無失点。山岡（オリックス）、甲斐野（ソフトバンク）、岸（楽天）のリレーで九回は山本（オリックス）が１失点。２戦連続の完封リレーこそならなかったが、最少失点に抑えた。
　“忍者”菊池も華麗なプレーを連発した。六回２死一塁では菊池がボテボテのゴロを前進して処理し、そのままバックトスで一塁へ送球。ピンチの芽をつんだ。七回１死でも二遊間のゴロをスライディングで好捕して一塁へ素早く送球。歓声一転、ため息がこだました。
　この試合の勝敗は１１日から始まるスーパーラウンドにも持ち越されるため、大きな１勝。スーパーラウンドではすでに進出を決めているメキシコ、アメリカなど６カ国と決勝の２枠を争う。
text:
SAMURAI JAPAN 3 consecutive wins! Seiya's rampage of 3 hits and 4 RBIs, including exciting bullets

07 Nov 2019

"Premier 12.1 Round, Japan 8-1 Taiwan" (7th, Taichung Intercontinental Baseball Stadium)
侍 Samurai Japan overwhelmed Taiwan with its main gun Suzuki (Hiroshima). Decorated the first round with an unbroken three-game winning streak and boosted the super round.
侍 In a completely away game, the spear gun is rampaged. Once in 2 deaths, No. 4 and Suzuki made the first three strikes in a timely manner to the left middle. When calling for momentum to the team, the following Yoshida (Orix) also hit the right front timely.
”Three times, the enemy land was calmed down by Suzuki's marvel. 2 The ball that was shaken out vigorously at first glance smashed the headwind and made two runs of two races that reached the middle of the left middle seat. With a long blow of airtime, he showed off the power of the masterpiece. In the sixth round, Maru (the giant) expanded his lead with timely two-strokes, the first hit of the tournament.
”The pitchers who sealed Puerto Rico the last night were persistent. Onano (Chunichi) also scored 4 hits and 4 hits without losing 3 times 4 hits. Yamamoto (ORIX), Kazuno (Softbank), Kishi (Rakuten) relay nine times Yamamoto (ORIX) has one goal. Although it wasn't a complete relay for two consecutive races, it kept it to the minimum goal.
“Ninja” Kikuchi also played splendidly. In the 6th 2nd and 1st race, Kikuchi moved forward and processed the ball and sent it back to the 1st base. I pinched buds. Even in the first 7 deaths, the Goro between the two games is caught by sliding and quickly sent to the baseball. A cheerful turn, a sigh.
Victory or defeat of this game will be carried over to the Super Round starting on the 11th, so it will be a big win. In the Super Round, it will compete for 6 slots, including Mexico and the United States, which have already decided to advance.
